A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved it! It was fresh\, the twists were new and more impactful and now we have an epic good vs bad going in for episode 9. In short it gave us the bad guys winning at the end and the good guys beaten down\,  leaving with just their lives but with a hope for the future. It also made Jedi storyline and the end game more interesting as now the showdown feels more global and personal that in any other time in the star wars universe.
